title: Timor: island of fear, island of hope
creator_credit: Timor Defence Foundation and Boubaker Adjala
brief_description: An historical introduction to East Timor as well as a commentary on contemporary political and military conflicts. Includes film reports from four Australian journalists killed at Balibo in October 1975 and footage of Australian Labor MHR Ken Fry at the United Nations.
title_for_label: Timor: island of fear, island of hope
